description:
Another of Shipon`s classmates, Pierre is good looking and a big talker, but doesn`t seem to have a lot more than that going for him. He likes to hit on virtually every girl he lays eyes on, even Rinna in one episode. He shows particular interest in Yayoi, though it`s not clear what her feelings for him may be. [Spoiler]He confesses his feelings to her and was turned down, but Yayoi later hints he might still have some hope.[/Spoiler]
(Wikipedia)
name: Takida Pierre
